# Stripe Docs Markdown

Entire Stripe API documentation in Markdown format. Organized by category and optimized for LLM context.

## Navigation
- [Documentation Root](./docs/)

## Key Sections
- Introduction (Auth, Errors, Expansion)
- Core Resources (Customers, Charges, Payouts)
- Payment Methods
- Products & Prices
- Checkout & Payment Links
- Billing (Subscriptions, Invoices)
- Connect (Accounts, Transfers)
